channel.description: Recent content in Post on Ctrl-Alt-Create

item.title: Install Papermod Hugo Theme
item.description: The Hugo Papermod theme is a lightweight, minimalist theme suitable for blogs and portfolios. It’s the same theme that I have used in this blog. The Papermod theme is based on the Hugo Paper theme and can be found here. However, when I tried installing it following the instructions given in their official wiki, the theme didn’t install properly. I had to go back and forth between the Hugo documentation and the Papermod wiki to successfully install the theme.
